overview: Across the city, a Canadian megalopolis, GÃ©rard Courant's images, blurred and faded, write the sound of Kraftwerck. Synthetic, techno... it illustrates movement, speed, rhythm. From the woods on the outskirts to the large, wide avenues, passers-by see the big cars go by. Night follows day, in the big city, pedestrians are anonymous.
title: Toronto 1998
